dict.string:
folders=( "/Developer/ADC Reference Library/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/Foundation" "/Developer/ADC Reference Library/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/ApplicationKit" "/Developer/ADC Reference Library/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/WebKit" )
class=${TM_SELECTED_TEXT:-$TM_CURRENT_WORD}
for (( i = 0; i < ${#folders[@]}; i++ )); do file="${folders[$i]}/ObjC_classic/Classes/${class}.html" if [[ -f $file ]]; then exit_show_html '<meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="0;URL=tm-file://'${file// /%20}'">' fi done
echo "Couldn’t find class: “${class}”"
